Name: NanoMachina
About the game: NanoMachina is a retro twin-stick shooter game inspired by old ZX Spectrum games, which can be seen and heard from the games audio/visual artstyle. Defeat all enemies and bosses, earn cool power-ups, complete all challenges and discover new features! DISCLAIMER! This game is quite difficult. Gamepad controller is recommended. Immerse youself back to the old days of gaming and start blasting, good luck!
